name: Sightlined
description:
The objective of the game in its current state is to be able to survive as long as possible by shooting the monsters in a procedurally generated dungeon with LIMITED SPACE to see.

The original idea was to make an actual dungeon crawler, but time happened sooo...  ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Movement:

  • ASWD - move
  • Right mouse button - shoot

CREDITS:

***RECOMMENDED TO PLAY WITH DOWNLOADABLE***
